Reviews.Title: Great phone with some high in furthers your find in more expensive phones
Reviews.Author: D. Ellis
Reviews.Content: I got this phone and I'm glad I did. It has A nice sound system and lots of extras. This phone also has some of the best HD quality video your only find in higher in phones. I just down graded from A Motorola phone with some of the best high in features your see in newer phones today. But I don't miss it at all though. Samsung has always had great produces and this one is no exception. Great phone,great price, but the camera could be A little better but the good out way the bad.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: Megan
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my mom for her birthday, she loves it I loved it. Its her first smart phone and she learned how to use it quickly. Very happy with the product. Got here within 3 days wich made me love it even more.

Reviews.Title: NOWHERE did it say that this was  a prepaid phone
Reviews.Author: Nannette Davis
Reviews.Content: I cannot use it and need to return it. WHat I NEED is a phone to replace one on my verizon contract, not a prepaid.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Robyn Patrick
Reviews.Content: This phone worked excellent and it came in the sealed packaging. This phone is actually one of the few prepaid available that pairs with MY Ford Sync with most of the features working.

Reviews.Title: unhappy
Reviews.Author: theresa hoffman
Reviews.Content: l didnt like the fact that i had to put a meamory card in to take pictures and that the camra doesnt have a flash

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Robert B.
Reviews.Content: for the price of the phone i was very impressed. i have had 4g phones but went to pre paid and this phone does the job and then some. i give it good marks all the way around

Reviews.Title: GREAT STARTER PHONE
Reviews.Author: Shadow Hunter
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREAT STARTER PHONE TO USE ON THE PAGEPLUS NETWORK (NO CONTRACT)FOR CHILDREN-PAY AS YOU GO--MY KIDS FIRST PHONE!

Reviews.Title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP!
Reviews.Author: raquel toledo
Reviews.Content: THE SCREEN DOESN'T WORK AND THE PHONE LOOKS SO CHEAP! RETURNING IT. IT WAS A DISSAPOINTMENT NEVER AGAIN, I HATE IT

Reviews.Title: Hmmmmm
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: I gave this 2 stars, the phone is okay but a month of service is not included. It is listed in the description "whats in the box" rather ambiguously, the seller knows better. Noone is going to pay $150 for the phone only, when Verizon sells it for $99 with free overnight shipping. Give me a break!

Reviews.Title: Not as expected
Reviews.Author: Suzy
Reviews.Content: This was going to be a gift but the packaging made it look as if it was used. I asked to return it and was sent by email the instructions to do so. The return process was smooth though.

ProductInfo.Features:
OS: Android 2.3, Gingerbread
Integrated Google Mobile Services, Microsoft Outlook Exchange (contacts and calendars), Social Networking Integration (contacts and calendars)
What's in the box: Samsung Illusion, battery, microSD card, charger, safety and warranty card, and starter guide
Platinum Edition has a black face and platinum color bezel and back.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Illusion Verizon Wireless Android 2.3 OS Prepaid Smartphone - Black
